attributes.action: I would like to see the age to vote to be lowered to 16 instead of 18
attributes.background: I feel that the age at the moment is too high because people of the age 16 and up now work and at 17 can die for this our country so why can't they vote? it seems to me that the Government don't trust us as a lot of the voting may damage their future so they should be able to have a say in that.
